title: Tales from the Pandoran Age: Rise of the Taloned Sire
description: A dark age hangs over Galactic civilization. Eleven centuries from the present day the Transhuman Overlords engage in a war with the organic colonies. Mankind's stellar civilizations falter for a millennium. But the worst has only begun. Psychic and parasitic, entities of dark matter begin to reveal themselves-soul eating, macabre, and legion. Galvanized by the Transhuman's horrific war, It has taken them the long centuries to cross the intergalactic void in number since the holocausts. They are hungry....
author: Dante D'Anthony
